title: The Happiness Program
details: Give the child a taste of meditation by creating a climate and atmosphere of love, acceptance and silence.

title: Support Service
details: In the same way that rain breaks into a house with a bad roof, desire breaks into the mind that has not been practicing meditation.

title: Join a new world
details: Meditation is like a gym in which you develop the powerful mental muscles of calm and insight.

title: Online Service
details: The more regularly and the more deeply you meditate, the sooner you will find yourself acting always from a center of peace.
